      • setProtocolData

        public void setProtocolData​(java.lang.Object protocolData)
        Description copied from interface: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Sets additional protocol specific data for this codec. For some complex cases codecs may need that data. The data is provided through ProtocolFactory which receives it in constructor.

        It is highly recommended to implement the protocolData object as set of interfaces that in turn provide access to codec specific data. Do not use protocolData as an object for a single codec, since it will be impossible to extend such object.
        Wrong: CodecData data = (CodecData) protocolData;
        Right: CodecData data = ((CodecDataHolder) protocolData).getCodecData();

        Specified by:
        setProtocolData in interface com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Parameters:
        protocolData - protocol specific data

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage​(Message message)
        Description copied from interface: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Sets message this codec works on. For some complex cases codecs may need it. The message has been provided by MessageConverter before encode/decode method is called.
        Specified by:
        setMessage in interface com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Parameters:
        message - protocol specific data

      • encodeToXml

        public void encodeToXml​(java.lang.Object customTypeObject,
                        javax.xml.transform.Result attributeElement)
                 throws com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CodecException
        Description copied from interface: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Serializes custom-type object to xml. Usually this method adds text value to the attributeElement in case of simple object or tree of elements for complex object. By contract the result accepts xml in appropriate position, so codec can just transform its representation to the Result.
        Specified by:
        encodeToXml in interface com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Parameters:
        customTypeObject - object to serialize
        attributeElement - xml attribute to store the data in
        Throws:
        com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CodecException - if some codec problems occurred

      • decodeFromXml

        public java.lang.Object decodeFromXml​(javax.xml.transform.Source attributeElement,
                                      AttributeDescription attributeDescription)
                               throws com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CodecException
        Description copied from interface: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Deserializes custom-type object from xml representation. Usually this method reads text value of the xml node in case of simple object or parses tree of elements for complex object. By the contract the source given is positioned at the node of the object. For DOMSource (as example) it is created around the node.
        Specified by:
        decodeFromXml in interface com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Parameters:
        attributeElement - xml attribute to restore the data from
        attributeDescription - attribute description object
        Returns:
        custom-type object value
        Throws:
        com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CodecException - if there is problems with xml data

      • getLogType

        public java.lang.String getLogType()
        Description copied from interface: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Returns type signature for attribute record written to log. Usually this will be one of the following strings: int, str, long, bstr Use LogTypes class to return standard values.
        Specified by:
        getLogType in interface com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol.runtime.codec.CustomTypeCodec
        Returns:
        type signature

                                           java.lang.String attributeId,
                                           org.w3c.dom.Element complexElement)
        Description copied from interface: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.impl.xml.XmlStructureHandler
        Indicates that complex (compound) attribute is processed. For now have sence in web-protocols only (to help maintain xml structure) and ignored in other protocols.

        onComplexAttribute in interface com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.impl.xml.XmlStructureHandler
        Parameters:

        attributeId - attribute name
        complexElement - DOM element of complex type
        Returns:
        current state
